spatial_accuracy.notes: Dining, kitchen, living, and bedroom are generally in the correct quadrants, but several key spatial relationships deviate from the 2D plan. The stair zone is not placed/enclosed as a distinct bottom-right annex like the plan, and the central circulation reads differently (hall/corridor geometry is altered). The bathroom core does not clearly preserve the plan’s split Wash Area vs Toilet layout and their exact positions. Entrance placement/transition into the living area does not match the plan’s top-right entry configuration. Window locations/quantity differ noticeably around multiple exterior walls. Overall room sizes/ratios appear shifted (kitchen and central open area oversized relative to bedroom/bath core).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is mostly consistent, but internal partitioning differs around the wash/toilet core and stair enclosure. Door embedding exists but several doors are not where the plan indicates (notably entry and service/core doors). Adjacencies are partially preserved (dining near kitchen; living near entry), but the stair annex relationship to the living/circulation is structurally altered. The plan’s distinct Wash Area is not faithfully represented as a separate room. Additional/exaggerated exterior access/landing elements appear that are not in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are present in the expected rooms (dining table in dining, L-kitchen counters, sofa set in living, bed in bedroom). However, furniture positioning does not strictly follow the 2D symbols (living seating arrangement/orientation differs; bathroom fixtures arrangement doesn’t clearly match the split wash/toilet depiction). Some scale relationships feel off due to enlarged circulation/kitchen areas.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean with coherent materials, good lighting, and clear room readability. Camera is isometric-like but not strictly orthographic (visible perspective). Geometry is mostly clean with no major mesh distortions, though some openings/edges read simplified compared to the plan.

detected_errors.description: Staircase location/enclosure deviates: 2D shows a distinct bottom-right stair annex; 3D places/frames stairs differently within the plan footprint.
Missing distinct Wash Area as a clearly separate room from the Toilet as shown in the 2D plan (3D reads as merged/ambiguous partitioning).
Entrance zone mismatch: 2D entry is top-right with a specific vestibule/door condition; 3D entry/transition into living appears relocated/reconfigured.
Door orientation/swing and exact door positions in the central core (bed/bath/circulation) do not match the 2D plan door placements.
Window placement/quantity is incorrect: multiple exterior windows in 3D do not correspond to the 2D plan’s window locations and extents.
Proportion distortion: kitchen and central circulation/open area appear oversized relative to bedroom and the wash/toilet core compared to 2D proportions.
Hallucinated exterior access elements (steps/landing treatment) not represented in the 2D floor plan.
